title: 6 Best Phones Under ₹30,000 (September 2025) - GadgetWiser - Mobile Phones Specs, Prices, Comparisons, Reviews, and News.
meta_description: Here are the best phone under ₹30000 that will best fulfill your needs whether you are a gamer, photographer or simply a casual user.

paragraphs: Update: We last checked this article for new phones on September 2nd, 2025.

Remember when a good phone was, like, under ₹15,000? Yeah, good times. Now, thanks to inflation and a million options, most people are looking in the ₹20,000 to ₹30,000 range. That’s where the magic happens – premium features without the flagship price tag. If you’re shopping for best phone under ₹3

Want the best possible phone under ₹30,000? The Poco F7 is the one for you. Powered by the new Snapdragon 8s Gen 4, it offers performance similar to the S24 Ultra. It has an AnTuTu score of more than 2 million, making it the most powerful phone in the segment.

Furthermore, it’s paired with up to 12GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. Unlike other phones, you get UFS 4.0 on all storage variants. On the front, there’s a large 6.83-inch flat display, which is perfect for watching your favourite TV shows. And just like premium flagship phones, you get an aluminium

It also comes with an IP68+IP69 rating, so you can take the phone with you for those occasional swims. To top it all up, there’s a massive 7500mAh battery. This is the largest battery available on a phone right now. And there’s also 90W wired charging, and it doubles up as a powerbank, letting you c

paragraphs: Samsung offers compelling mid-range and near-flagship phones under Rs. 30,000 in 2025, featuring 5G, AMOLED displays, and strong cameras.
Always balance specs such as RAM, storage, display refresh rate, and software support when making a choice.
Opt for Samsung phones with reliable support (including security/OS updates) for enhanced longevity in the Rs. 30,000 range.

Premium features and expansive displays are no longer limited to flagship models. In fact, nearly 40% of Samsung smartphones sold in India in 2024 came from the mid-range A-series and M/F-series, underscoring the growing demand for value-driven devices. json_ld.articleBody: Overview:.Samsung offers compelling mid-range and near-flagship phones under Rs. 30,000 in 2025, featuring 5G, AMOLED displays, and strong cameras.Always balance specs such as RAM, storage, display refresh rate, and software support when making a choice.Opt for Samsung phones with reliable support (including security/OS updates) for enhanced longevity in the Rs. 30,000 range..Premium features and expansive displays are no longer limited to flagship models. In fact, nearly 40% of Samsung smartphones sold in India in 2024 came from the mid-range A-series and M/F-series, underscoring the growing demand for value-driven devices. This shift highlights how consumers increasingly prioritize balanced performance at accessible price points..What are the Best Samsung Mobile Phones Under Rs. 30,000?.Here are listed some of the best Samsung mobile phones under 30000 2025:.Samsung Galaxy A36 5G - Rs. 28,499 (8GB RAM + 128GB storage).Samsung Galaxy A36 5G is a premium-priced, well-performing, and fully loaded mid-range phone with a good screen presentation.Display: 6.71" FHD+ Super AMOLED, 120Hz refresh rate.Processor: Qualcomm Snapdragon 6 Gen 3.Camera: 50MP (OIS) + 8MP Ultra-Wide + 12MP Front Camera.Battery: 5,000mAh, charging at 45W.Software: One UI 7 based on Android 15.Key features: AI technology, Knox Vault security, IP67 water/dust protection.Buy Now.Samsung Galaxy A26 5G - Rs. 21,499 (6GB RAM + 128GB storage). .A26 has a relative pricing, well-rounded option, decent specifications, photo features, and long battery life.Display:  6.7" Super AMOLED, refresh rate up to 120Hz.Processor: Exynos 1380.Camera: 50MP Main + 8MP Ultra-Wide + 2MP Macro; 13MP Front.Battery: 5,000m/h (25W fast charging).Software: One UI 7.Highlights: IP67 water/dust resistance, AI image enhancement.Buy NowAlso read: Samsung Galaxy A26 5G: Prices, Specs and More.Samsung Galaxy A16 5G - Rs. 16,886 (6GB RAM + 128GB storage).Galaxy A16 is a low-level model that has the desired specifications, fast performance, and quality delivery of images.Display: 6.6" Super AMOLED, 90Hz refresh rate.Processor: Exynos 850.Camera: 50MP + 2MP depth (+2MP macro) main, 8MP front.Battery: 5000mAh, 15W fast charging.Software: One UI 7.Highlights: Affordable 5G version.Buy Now.Samsung Galaxy M36 5G - Rs. 13,999 (6GB RAM + 128GB storage).An extended-use and long-lasting battery phone with good performance and a big screen.Display: 6.7" Super AMOLED, 120Hz refresh rate.Processor: Exynos 1380.Camera: 50MP main + 8MP ultra-wide + 2MP macro; 13MP front.Battery: 6,000mAh with 45W fast charging.Software: One UI 7 based on Android 15.Highlights: Long-lasting battery, AI features, Knox Vault security.Buy NowAlso read: Best Wireless Charging Mobile Phones Under Rs. 30,000 in 2025.Conclusion.There are various Samsung phones under Rs. 30,000, catering to different needs:Galaxy A36 5G: Suited to customers who want a high-quality display and performance.Galaxy A26 5G: To find the balance between characteristics and costs.Galaxy A16 5G: A smartphone with minimal capabilities at a low cost.Galaxy M36 5G: The phone is designed for those who prioritise battery life and AI functionality the most.All Samsung 5G phones India 2025 models have their special advantages, and users will be able to find a Samsung smartphone model that suits their needs within a budget of Rs. 30,000..FAQs.1. Which Samsung phone under Rs. 30,000 has the best camera?A35 5G leads the pack in this category with its 50 imps OIS sensor and balanced imaging system.2. Will Samsung provide software updates for these models?Yes. A-series models (2025/2024) receive up to 6 years of OS and security updates.3. Are these phones good for gaming?Yes, provided that they are A35 and A36 with high refresh rate and powerful chipsets. For those who prefer heavy gaming, it is better to opt for a version with more RAM/storage.4. Which phone is best for battery life?All midrange Samsung smartphones have 5,000 mAh batteries, but the efficiency of the chipset and software also matters. A35 and A36 tend to perform best.5. Should I go for the A-series or the M-series?A-series provides superior features and software support. M-series provides an improved cost/battery tradeoff. Choose the best Samsung camera phones under 30000 based on priority..Join our WhatsApp Channel to get the latest news, exclusives and videos on WhatsApp
